description:
If modes are your jam, these are your lights. With 21 different modes to choose from, 11 out back and 10 up front, there is a setting to match your ride. Both taillight and headlight are outfitted with 5 LEDs that will help keep you seen. Easy tool free mount fits round bars and seat posts or aero parts, letting you swap the lights between your trusty commuter and your race-bred steed.

  • Headlight, 1 lighting modes, 3 in steady and 7 in flashing; steady: 100 lumens (2.5h), 50 lumens (4.5h), 15 lumens (11h), flash 1 – 25 lumens (13h), flash 2 – 50 lumens (4h), flash 3 – 50 lumens (5.5h), flash 4 – 75 lumens (4.5), flash 5 – 25 lumens (11h), flash 6 – 50 lumens (21.5h), and day flash – 400 lumens (5h)
  • Taillight, 11 lighting modes, 3 in steady and 8 in flashing; steady: 45 lumens (2.25h), 15 lumens (7h), 3 lumens (30h), flash 1 – 25 lumens (8h), flash 2 – 15 lumens (8h), flash 3 – 15 lumens (8.3h), flash 4 – 20 lumens (10h), flash 5 – 5 lumens (29h), flash 6 – 3 lumens (57h), day flash 1 – 150 lumens (6.5h) and day flash 2 – 100 lumens (7h)
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Headlight has side visibility, so vehicles to your left and right can see you
  • Taillight features a wide-angle lens that provides over 270° of visibility
  • Both lights have mounts that are round and aero compatible
  • Taillight charges via micro-USB
  • Headlight has an integrated USB plug
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone mounting straps mounts to your bike without tools
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your lights from even the heaviest downpours
name: Lezyne Strip Drive Lights
